content.query:
use logical_DWH_nyc_taxi go

if OBJECT_id('silver.taxi_zones') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zones go 

create EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zones 
    with(
        LOCATION = 'silver_layer/taxi_zone',
        DATA_SOURCE = logical_DWH_exDS,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquert_file
    )AS
SELECT * from bronze.taxi_zones go 


SELECT * from silver.taxi_zones go
